1.text: Review the names of strings, frets, and notes.

2.text: Make sure you guitar is tuned.
2.vid: /c/c0/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 2 Version 5.360p.mp4

3.text: Put your ring finger on the third fret of the first string.
3.vid: /d/d5/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 3 Version 5.360p.mp4

4.text: Put your index finger on the second fret of the fifth string.
4.vid: /c/c1/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 4 Version 5.360p.mp4

5.text: Put your middle finger on the third fret of the sixth string.
5.vid: /3/33/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 5 Version 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Strum all six strings at once to play your chord.
6.vid: /2/21/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 6 Version 5.360p.mp4

7.text: Practice moving your hand in and out of chord position.
7.vid: /a/ad/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 7 Version 5.360p.mp4

8.text: Try the abbreviated version of the G major chord.
8.vid: /a/a1/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 8 Version 5.360p.mp4

9.text: Play the "rock" G for a richer, deeper sound.
9.vid: /6/63/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 9 Version 5.360p.mp4

10.text: Use your pinkie on the high E string.
10.vid: /c/ca/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 10 Version 5.360p.mp4

11.text: Use a D chord shape at the seventh fret.
11.vid: /f/f1/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 11 Version 4.360p.mp4

12.text: Vary it up with a G7 chord.

13.text: Make a bar with your index finger at the third fret.
13.vid: /6/65/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 13 Version 2.360p.mp4

14.text: Create an E major chord shape with your remaining fingers.

15.vid: /9/97/Play the G Major Chord on Guitar Step 15 Version 2.360p.mp4
